transcript.text: Good morning everyone, let's get started.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Morning!
transcript.speaker: Speaker_01

transcript.text: Hey, morning.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_02

transcript.text: Morning everyone.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_03

transcript.text: Alright, today’s focus is finalizing the product strategy for Q1 2026.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: We have three main deliverables: the new onboarding flow, marketing launch assets, and backend optimization.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Let's start with onboarding. Sarah, I’d like you to lead the onboarding flow redesign.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Sure, happy to.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_01

transcript.text: Great. Your task is to complete the wireframes by **November 5th** and have the first prototype ready by **November 15th**.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Got it. I’ll sync with the UX team right after this call.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_01

transcript.text: Perfect. Next, Tom, I’d like you to handle marketing launch materials — landing page, blog post, and social assets.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Sounds good. What’s the timeline?
transcript.speaker: Speaker_02

transcript.text: Kickoff on **November 3rd**, and all materials should be finalized by **November 20th** so we can start pre-launch testing.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Copy that. I’ll coordinate with design for the visuals.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_02

transcript.text: Excellent. Lastly, backend optimization — Maya, this one’s on you.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Understood. Are there specific targets for performance?
transcript.speaker: Speaker_03

transcript.text: Yes, aim for at least a **15% improvement in API response times**. Start analysis by **November 2nd**, and deliver your first benchmark report by **November 18th**.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Got it. I’ll work closely with DevOps on that.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_03

transcript.text: Great. We’ll review progress in our next sync on **November 8th**.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Quick question — who’s responsible for gathering feedback from the beta testers?
transcript.speaker: Speaker_02

transcript.text: Good point. Sarah, can you take that one as part of onboarding usability testing?
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Yes, I’ll include that in the prototype testing phase between November 10th and 12th.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_01

transcript.text: Perfect. That should give us enough time to iterate before the launch materials are locked.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Is there anything blocking anyone from starting?
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Not from my side.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_02

transcript.text: All good here.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_01

transcript.text: Same here, all clear.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_03

transcript.text: Excellent. Thanks everyone — let’s make sure to post status updates in the project Slack channel every Friday.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_00

transcript.text: Will do.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_02

transcript.text: Thanks, talk soon!
transcript.speaker: Speaker_01

transcript.text: Bye all.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_03

full_text: Good morning everyone, let's get started. Morning! Hey, morning. Morning everyone. Alright, today’s focus is finalizing the product strategy for Q1 2026. We have three main deliverables: the new onboarding flow, marketing launch assets, and backend optimization. Let's start with onboarding. Sarah will lead the onboarding redesign (Nov 1–15). Tom will handle marketing assets (Nov 3–20). Maya will work on backend optimization (Nov 2–18). We'll regroup on Nov 8 for updates.
